history.content:
TL;DR: Free Ventures is hosting a virtual fireside chat with top venture capital firm 8VC featuring partners from their Bio-IT team. Come through to learn more about fascinating developments in the Bio-IT space, 8VC career opportunities, and the chance to win swag (pics below).
Event here: https://fb.me/e/23SosIYYj
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Free Ventures is thrilled to welcome our partner 8VC to the virtual Berkeley campus for this incredible speaker panel. Get to know the 8VC team on a personal level as they give an overview of the Bio-IT investment areas, talk about some specific investments in the space, and provide information on their Bio-IT Fellowship/8VC Fellowship, followed by some time in the end for Q&A.
We will also be randomly choosing two lucky winners out of the event attendees to win some free 8VC swag!
About 8VC: 8VC is a leading technology and life sciences investment firm investing in visionary teams and backing industry-transforming companies. We seek to partner with top founders and entrepreneurs to build lasting technology platforms and create long-term economic and societal value. We are a dynamic team of entrepreneurs, engineers, investors, and philosophers. We value operating experience and action, but also new ideas and creative theories. Our unique blend of strengths and worldviews enables us to model investment opportunities using multiple frameworks and help companies succeed in unparalleled ways.
Speaker Bio: David Yang
David is a member of the investment team where he focuses on the Bio-IT and healthcare space. David was previously a research associate at the Broad Institute where he developed new methods for viral diagnostics and sequencing, built recommendation engines as a machine learning engineer at Facebook Reality Labs and worked on deep learning models for protein design at Harvard Medical School. David graduated from Harvard University, magna cum laude, where he studied Computer Science and Biology
.
Speaker Bio: Francisco Giminez
Francisco is a Partner on the investment team at 8VC. He focuses on Bio-IT, Health-IT, and enterprise AI investments. Francisco previously was the Resident Data Scientist at Formation8 Partners where he worked with portfolio companies to strategize, prototype, and recruit for data products. Francisco received his Ph.D. from Stanford in Biomedical Informatics and he got his B.S. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences from UC Berkeley.
Speaker Bio: David Moskowitz
David focuses on the Bio-IT space. Prior to joining 8VC, David completed his Ph.D. in Biomedical Informatics at Stanford University, where he concurrently received an M.S. in Statistics. His research focused on the development of statistical and machine learning approaches for analyzing genomics data, and the characterization of epigenetic changes associated with aging in T cells. Previously, David was a Bioinformatics Analyst at Einstein College of Medicine, where he worked on the genetics of aging and human disease. He performed his undergraduate studies in computational Biology at Brown University.
history.subject: Free Ventures x 8VC Fireside Chat
